name: Wpf-master-child
tagline: Simple example of a master-child view in WPF
body:
### Wpf Parent Child Example
This application demonstrates how to create a parent-child relationship between two controls in WPF.

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
